ExportDialog.CautionsForPrintingDescription: Please print without border or without scaling (magnification 100% / fit to paper).
ExportDialog.exportDescription: Export is ready. Please use the following method to print.
ExportDialog.forIPhoneDescription1: Press the "<1/> Export" button and select "Save to Files" to save the file. After saving the file, you can print it using various printing applications and services.
ExportDialog.forIPhoneDescription2: If you print from the "<1/> Print" button, the image may be printed at a reduced size.
ExportDialog.forPCDescription: Press the "<1/> Print" button to print.
